è¿åŠ¨å­¦

å®šä¹‰æƒ¯æ€§ç³» \(\{\vec{a_1},\vec{a_2},\vec{a_3}\}\) è¡¨ç¤ºä¸º {A} å’Œæœºä½“ç³»è¡¨ \(\{\vec{b_1},\vec{b_2},\vec{b_3}\}\) ç¤ºä¸º \(\{B\}\)ã€‚\(\{B\}\) åœ¨ \(\{A\}\) çš„è¡¨è¾¾ä¸ºï¼š

\[R^A_B=\begin{bmatrix}ğ‘\psi ğ‘\theta âˆ’ğ‘ \phi ğ‘ \psi ğ‘ \theta & âˆ’ğ‘\phi ğ‘ \psi & ğ‘\psi ğ‘ \theta +ğ‘\theta ğ‘ \phi ğ‘ \psi \\ğ‘\theta ğ‘ \psi +ğ‘\psi ğ‘ \phi ğ‘ \theta & ğ‘\phi ğ‘\psi & ğ‘ \psi ğ‘ \theta âˆ’ğ‘\psi ğ‘\theta ğ‘ \phi \\âˆ’ğ‘\phi ğ‘ \theta & ğ‘ \phi & ğ‘\phi ğ‘\theta \end{bmatrix}\]

å››æ—‹ç¿¼çš„è¿åŠ¨å­¦æ–¹ç¨‹å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

\[\text {æ¬§æ‹‰è§’æ¨¡å‹}\begin {cases}\dot {\mathbf {p}} = \mathbf {v} \\\dot {\mathbf {\Theta}} = W \cdot \mathbf {\omega}\end {cases} \\\text {æ—‹è½¬çŸ©é˜µæ¨¡å‹}\begin {cases}\dot {\mathbf {p}} = \mathbf {v} \\\dot {\mathbf {R}} = \mathbf {R}[\mathbf {\omega}]_\times\end {cases}\]

å…¶ä¸­ï¼Œ\(\mathbf{p}\) è¡¨ç¤ºå››æ—‹ç¿¼ä¸¤ä¸ªæ—¶åˆ»è´¨å¿ƒä½ç½®çš„å‘é‡ï¼Œ\(\mathbf{v}\) è¡¨ç¤º \(\{B\}\) ç›¸å¯¹ \(\{A\}\) çš„çº¿é€Ÿåº¦åœ¨åæ ‡ç³» \(\{A\}\) ä¸­çš„è¡¨è¾¾ã€‚

\(\dot{\mathbf{\Theta}}\) è¡¨ç¤ºå§¿æ€å˜åŒ–ç‡ï¼ˆå¹¶æ— å…·ä½“å¯¹åº”åæ ‡ç³»ï¼Œæˆ–è€…è¯´ä¸åŒè½´å¯¹åº”åæ ‡ç³»ä¸åŒï¼‰ï¼Œ\(\mathbf{\omega}\) æ˜¯åæ ‡ç³» \(\{B\}\) ä¸‹çš„æœºä½“æ—‹è½¬è§’é€Ÿåº¦ã€‚

\[\mathbf{\Theta} = \begin{bmatrix}\phi & \theta & \psi \end{bmatrix}^T\]

å§¿æ€å˜åŒ–ç‡ \(\dot{\mathbf{\Theta}}\) ä¸æœºä½“è§’é€Ÿåº¦ \(\mathbf{\omega}\) å¹¶ä¸ç›¸ç­‰ï¼Œå…¶è½¬æ¢å…³ç³»å–å†³äºæ¬§æ‹‰è§’ç±»å‹ï¼Œä»¥ ZXY ä¸ºä¾‹ï¼š

\[\begin{cases}\dot{\phi} = R_Y(\theta) \cdot \mathbf{\omega}_x \vec{b_1} \\\dot{\theta}=\mathbf{\omega}_y \vec{b_2} \\\dot{\psi} = R_X(\phi)R_Y(\theta) \cdot \mathbf{\omega}_z \vec{b_3}\end{cases}\]

æ¨å¾—

\[\begin{bmatrix}\mathbf{\omega}_x \\ \mathbf{\omega}_y \\ \mathbf{\omega}_z\end{bmatrix}=\begin{bmatrix}c\theta & 0 & -c\phi s\theta \\0 & 1 & s\phi \\s\theta & 0 & c\phi c\theta\end{bmatrix}\begin{bmatrix}\dot{\phi} \\ \dot{\theta} \\ \dot{\psi}\end{bmatrix}\]

\[W=\begin{bmatrix}c\theta & 0 & s\theta \\t\phi s\theta & 1 & -t\phi c\theta \\-s\theta / c\phi & 0 & c\theta/c\phi\end{bmatrix}\]

æ³¨æ„ \(W\) å¹¶éæ—‹è½¬çŸ©é˜µï¼Œä¸æ˜¯é½æ¬¡çŸ©é˜µã€‚

åŠ¨åŠ›å­¦

é€šè¿‡ç‰›é¡¿ - æ¬§æ‹‰æ–¹ç¨‹å»ºç«‹åŠ¨åŠ›å­¦æ¨¡å‹ã€‚ç”±ç‰›é¡¿ - æ¬§æ‹‰æ–¹ç¨‹å¯çŸ¥ï¼Œåˆšä½“è¿åŠ¨ = è´¨å¿ƒçš„å¹³åŠ¨ + ç»•è´¨å¿ƒçš„è½¬åŠ¨ã€‚

\[m\ddot {\mathbf {p}}=-m\cdot g\vec {a_3}+R^A_B\cdot f\vec {b_3}\quad\text {ç‰›é¡¿æ–¹ç¨‹}\\ I\mathbf {\dot {\omega}}+\mathbf {\omega}\times I\mathbf {\omega}=G_a+\tau\quad\text {æ¬§æ‹‰æ–¹ç¨‹}\]

å…¶ä¸­ï¼Œ\(f\) å’Œ \(\tau\) åˆ†åˆ«ä¸ºå››æ—‹ç¿¼äº§ç”Ÿçš„æ¨åŠ›å’ŒåŠ›çŸ©ï¼Œ\(G_a\) è¡¨ç¤ºé™€èºåŠ›çŸ©ã€‚

é™€èºåŠ›çŸ©ï¼šå½“ç”µæœºé«˜é€Ÿæ—‹è½¬çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œç›¸å½“äºä¸€ä¸ªé™€èºã€‚é«˜é€Ÿæ—‹è½¬çš„é™€èºæ˜¯éå¸¸ç¨³å®šçš„ä¸ªä½“ï¼Œå…·æœ‰ä¿æŒè‡ªèº«è½´å‘ä¸å˜çš„èƒ½åŠ›ã€‚å› æ­¤å¦‚æœæœ‰å¤–åŠ›æƒ³æ”¹å˜é™€èºè½¬è½´çš„æ–¹å‘ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆä¼šäº§ç”Ÿä¸€ä¸ªé™€èºåŠ›çŸ©æ¥æŠµæŠ—è¿™ç§æ”¹å˜ã€‚

å•ä¸ªèºæ—‹æ¡¨çš„é™€èºåŠ›çŸ©å¯ä»¥è¡¨ç¤ºä¸ºï¼š

\[\begin{aligned}G_{a,k} & = J_{RP}(-1)^k\varpi_k\vec{b_3}\times\omega \\& = J_{RP}(\omega\times\vec{b_3})(-1)^{k+1}\varpi_k\end{aligned}\]

å…¶ä¸­ï¼Œ\(k\) ä¸ºç”µæœºåºå·ï¼Œ\(J_{PR}\) ä¸ºè½¬å­åŠ æ—‹ç¿¼çš„è½¬åŠ¨æƒ¯é‡ï¼Œ\(\varpi\) ä¸ºç”µæœºè§’é€Ÿåº¦ã€‚ç”±äºï¼š

\[\omega\times\vec{b_3}=\begin{bmatrix}\omega_y & -\omega_x & 0\end{bmatrix}^T\]

æ‰€ä»¥ï¼š

\[G_{a}=\begin{bmatrix}-J_{PR}\omega_y\varpi_{sum} \\J_{PR}\omega_x \varpi_{sum}\\0\end{bmatrix}\\\varpi_{sum} = -\varpi_1+\varpi_2-\varpi_3+\varpi_4\]

å°†æ— äººæœºè§†ä¸ºå‡åŒ€å¯¹ç§°çš„åˆšä½“ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è®¤ä¸ºè½¬åŠ¨æƒ¯é‡ï¼š

\[I=\begin{bmatrix}I_x&&\\&I_y&\\&&I_z\end{bmatrix}\]

ç¨ä½œæ•´ç†ï¼š

\[\ddot{\mathbf{p}}=\begin{bmatrix}\ddot{x} \\\ddot{y} \\\ddot{z}\end{bmatrix}=\begin{bmatrix}\frac{f}{m}(s\theta c\psi+s\phi c\theta s\psi) \\\frac{f}{m}(s\theta s\psi-s\phi c\theta c\psi) \\\frac{f}{m}c\phi c\theta-g\end{bmatrix}\]

\[\dot{\omega}=\begin{bmatrix}\dot{\omega_x}\\\dot{\omega_y}\\\dot{\omega_z}\end{bmatrix}=\begin{bmatrix}\frac{1}{I_x}[\omega_y\omega_z(I_y-I_z)-J_{RP}\omega_y\varpi_{sum}+\tau_x] \\\frac{1}{I_y}[\omega_x\omega_z(I_z-I_x)+J_{RP}\omega_x\varpi_{sum}+\tau_y] \\\frac{1}{I_z}[\omega_x\omega_y(I_x-I_y)+\tau_z]\end{bmatrix}\]

çº¿æ€§æ§åˆ¶å™¨

é¦–å…ˆè¿›è¡Œçº¿æ€§åŒ–ï¼Œå‡è®¾æ— äººæœºå¤„äºæ‚¬åœçŠ¶æ€ï¼Œåˆ™ \(\phi\) å’Œ \(\theta\) è¶‹äº 0ï¼Œ\(\frac{f}{m}\) è¶‹äº \(g\)ã€‚

\[\begin{bmatrix}\ddot{x} \\\ddot{y} \\\ddot{z}\end{bmatrix}=\begin{bmatrix}g(\theta c\psi+\phi s\psi) \\g(s\theta \psi-\phi c\psi) \\\frac{f}{m}-g\end{bmatrix}\]

PID:

\[\ddot{z_c}=\ddot{z_{des}}+K_{d,z}(z_{des}-z)+K_{d,z}(\dot{z_{des}}-\dot{z})\]

å‰é¦ˆåŠ  PD

æ¨¡å‹ï¼š

\[f=m(g+\ddot{z_c}) \\\phi_c=\frac{1}{g}(\ddot{x}s\psi-\ddot{y}c\psi) \\\theta_c=\frac{1}{g}(\ddot{x}c\psi+\ddot{y}s\psi)\]

å€¼å¾—æ³¨æ„çš„æ˜¯ï¼Œ\(\psi\) å•ç‹¬è¿›è¡Œæ§åˆ¶ã€‚

PIDï¼š

\[\dot{\omega}_{x,c}=K_{d,\phi}(\phi_{c}-\phi)+K_{d,\phi}(\omega_{x,c}-\omega_x) \\\dot{\omega}_{y,c}=K_{d,\theta}(\theta_{c}-\theta)+K_{d,\theta}(\omega_{y,c}-\omega_y) \\\dot{\omega}_{z,c}=K_{d,\psi}(\psi_{c}-\psi)+K_{d,\psi}(\omega_{z,c}-\omega_z)\]

æ¨¡å‹ï¼š

\[\tau = I\mathbf{\dot{\omega}_c}+\mathbf{\omega}\times I\mathbf{\omega}\]

entry.title: ç›¸æœºæ¨¡å‹ä¸æ ‡å®šç¬”è®°
entry.content:
é’ˆå­”æ¨¡å‹çš„åæ ‡ç³»æŠ•å½±

ä¸–ç•Œåæ ‡ç³» -> ç›¸æœºåæ ‡ç³» -> å½’ä¸€åŒ–å¹³é¢ -> åƒç´ åæ ‡ç³»

ä¸–ç•Œåæ ‡ç³» -> ç›¸æœºåæ ‡ç³»ï¼ˆå¤–å‚ï¼‰

\[P_c=RP_w+t=\begin{bmatrix}R&t\\0&1\end{bmatrix}P_w=TP_w=\begin{bmatrix}X\\Y\\Z\end{bmatrix}\]

ç›¸æœºåæ ‡ç³» -> å½’ä¸€åŒ–å¹³é¢

å¦‚ä¸Šå›¾æ‰€ç¤ºï¼Œ\(X'\) ä¸ºå½’ä¸€åŒ–å¹³é¢åæ ‡ï¼Œ\(X\) ä¸ºç›¸æœºåæ ‡ç³»åæ ‡ï¼Œ\(f\) ä¸ºç„¦è·ï¼ˆé€šå¸¸å•ä½æ˜¯æ¯«ç±³ mmï¼‰ã€‚æ ¹æ®ç›¸ä¼¼ä¸‰è§’å½¢ï¼š \[\begin{aligned}\begin{cases}X'=f \frac XZ \\Y'=f \frac YZ\end{cases}\end{aligned}\] æ­¤æ—¶å·²å°†å½’ä¸€åŒ–å¹³é¢ç¿»è½¬ï¼ˆéå€’åƒï¼‰ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ \(X'\) ä¸ \(Y'\) éœ€å–è´Ÿã€‚

å½’ä¸€åŒ–å¹³é¢ -> åƒç´ åæ ‡ç³»

åƒç´ åæ ‡ç³»é€šå¸¸ä»å›¾åƒå·¦ä¸Šè§’å¼€å§‹

è®¾åœ¨ \(X'\) æ–¹å‘ï¼š\(1\,pix=dx\,mm\) ï¼ˆæ¯«ç±³è½¬åƒç´ ï¼‰;

åœ¨ \(Y'\) æ–¹å‘ï¼š\(1\,pix=dy\,mm\)

åˆ™ï¼š \[\begin{cases}u=\frac {1}{dx}X'+c_x\\v=\frac {1}{dy}Y'+c_y\end{cases}\] ä¸å‰ä¸€æ­¥åˆå¹¶ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼š \[\begin{cases}u=f_x\frac XZ+c_x\\v=f_y\frac YZ+c_y\end{cases}\] è½¬æ¢æˆçŸ©é˜µå½¢å¼ï¼š \[\begin {aligned}\underbrace {\begin {pmatrix}u\\v\\1\end {pmatrix}}_\text {å…¶æ¬¡åæ ‡} = \frac 1Z\begin {pmatrix}f_x&\gamma&c_x\\0&f_y&c_y\\0 &0&1\end {pmatrix}\underbrace {\begin {pmatrix}X\\Y\\Z\end {pmatrix}}_\text {éå…¶æ¬¡åæ ‡}=\frac 1ZKP\end {aligned}\] å…¶ä¸­ï¼š \[\begin{cases}f_x=\frac f{dx}\\f_y=\frac f{dy}\end{cases}\] \(\gamma\) æè¿°çš„æ˜¯ä¸¤ä¸ªåæ ‡è½´çš„åè½¬ã€‚

\(K\) ç§°ä¸ºå†…å‚çŸ©é˜µ

å¯¹äºé½æ¬¡åæ ‡ï¼Œå°ºåº¦å› å­ï¼ˆè¿™é‡ŒæŒ‡è·ç¦» Zï¼‰ä¸ä¼šæ”¹å˜åæ ‡å€¼çš„ï¼›ä¸å…‰å¿ƒä½äºåŒä¸€ç›´çº¿çš„æ‰€æœ‰ç‚¹åœ¨å½’ä¸€åŒ–å¹³é¢ä¸Šæ˜¯åŒä¸€ä¸ªæŠ•å½±ç‚¹ã€‚

ç•¸å˜çŸ«æ­£

ç•¸å˜ä¸»è¦åˆ†ä¸ºäº†å¾„å‘ç•¸å˜å’Œåˆ‡å‘ç•¸å˜ï¼š

å¾„å‘ç•¸å˜

ç•¸å˜æ¨¡å‹ä½¿ç”¨å¤šé¡¹å¼æ¥æè¿°å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š \[\begin{aligned}x_{distort}=x_n\cdot(1+k_1r^2+k_2r^4+k_3r^6)\\y_{distort}=y_n\cdot(1+k_1r^2+k_2r^4+k_3r^6)\end{aligned}\] å…¶ä¸­ \(x_n\) å’Œ \(y_n\) ä¸ºå½’ä¸€åŒ–åæ ‡ï¼š \[\begin{cases}x_n = \frac XZ \\y_n = \frac YZ\end{cases}\] æ³¨æ„ä»–ä»¬å¹¶ä¸æ˜¯å½’ä¸€åŒ–å¹³é¢ä¸Šçš„åæ ‡ï¼Œä¸å…¶ç›¸å·®äº†ä¸€ä¸ªå› å­ \(f\)ã€‚ \[r=\sqrt{x_n^2+y_n^2}\] ä¸€èˆ¬å¤šé¡¹å¼å–åˆ°å‰ä¸‰é¡¹ï¼Œå³ä¸‰ä¸ªå¾„å‘ç•¸å˜å‚æ•° \(k_1\),\(k_2\),\(k_3\)ã€‚

å¯¹äºç•¸å˜å¾ˆå°çš„ä¸­å¿ƒåŒºåŸŸï¼Œã€€ä¸»è¦èµ·ä½œç”¨çš„æ˜¯ \(k_1\)ï¼›

å¯¹äºç•¸å˜è¾ƒå¤§çš„è¾¹ç¼˜åŒºåŸŸï¼Œä¸»è¦èµ·ä½œç”¨çš„æ˜¯ \(k_2\)ï¼›

å¯¹äºç•¸å˜å¾ˆå¤§çš„é±¼çœ¼ç›¸æœºï¼Œå¯ä»¥åŠ å…¥ \(k_3\) æ¥è¡¨ç¤ºï¼›

åˆ‡å‘ç•¸å˜

é€šå¸¸æ˜¯é€é•œä¸åƒå¹³é¢æ²¡æœ‰ä¸¥æ ¼å¹³è¡Œå¯¼è‡´ã€‚

ç•¸å˜æ¨¡å‹æè¿°å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š \[\begin{aligned}x_{distort}=x_n+2p_1x_ny_n+p_2(r^2+2x^2) \\y_{distort}=y_n+p_1(r^2+2y^2)+2p_2x_ny_n\end{aligned}\]

ç•¸å˜çŸ«æ­£

æˆ‘ä»¬åˆå¹¶ä¸€ä¸‹å¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ°ï¼š \[\begin{cases}x_{distort}=x_n\cdot(1+k_1r^2+k_2r^4+k_3r^6)+2p_1x_ny_n+p_2(r^2+2x^2)\\y_{distort}=y_n\cdot(1+k_1r^2+k_2r^4+k_3r^6)+p_1(r^2+2y^2)+2p_2x_ny_n\end{cases}\] é€šå¸¸è®°ç›¸æœºç•¸å˜å‚æ•°ä¸ºï¼š \[disCoffes = [k_1,k_2,p_1,p_2,k_3]\]

å»ç•¸å˜ç¨‹åº

Summary

Balance Search Tree

2-3 Search Tree

  • Perfect balance

    Every path from root to null link has same length.

  • Symmetric order

    inoder traversal yields keys in ascending order.

Insert

  • Insert into a 2-node at bottom

    • Search for key.
    • Replace 2-node with 3-node

  • Insert into a 3-node at bottom

    • Add new key to 3-node to create temporary 4-node
    • Move middle key in 4-node into parent

  • Summary

Performance
  • Worst case: lg N
  • Best case: log3 N

Red-black Tree

  • Represent 2-3 tree as a BST
  • Use â€œinternalâ€ left-leaning links as â€œglueâ€ for 3-nodes.
  • No node has two red links connected to it.
  • Every path from root to null link has the same number of black links.
  • Red links lean left.
search

Search is the same as for elementary BST (ignore color).

Representation
Operations

  • Left rotation

  • Right rotation

  • Color flip

Strategy

  • Insert into a tree with exactly 1 node.

  • Insert into a tree with exactly 2 nodes.

Implementation
  • Right child red, left child black: rotate left
  • Left child, left-left grandchild red: rotate right
  • Both children red: flip colors

B-trees

  • At least 2 key-link pairs in other nodes.
  • At least M/2 key-link pairs in other nodes.
  • External nodes contain client keys.
  • Internal nodes contain copies of keys to guide search.

BST implementation

Implementation
Range search

Typical case: R + logN

Worst case (assuming tree is balanced): R + N^(1/2)

Nearest neighbor search

Typical case: logN

Worst case (even if tree is balanced): N

Interval search trees

1d interval search
Insert

To insert an interval (lo, hi):

  • Insert into BST, using lo as the key.
  • Update max in each node on search path.
Search

To search for any one interval that intersects query interval (lo, hi):

  • If interval in node intersects query interval, return it.
  • Else if left subtrees is null, go right.
  • Else if max endpoint in left subtrees is less than lo, go right.
  • Else go left.
Inplementation

Use a RB BST to guarantee performance.

Method for computing array index from key.

Separate Chaining

Implementation

  • get

  • put

Analysis

Linear Probing

  • Hash. Map key to integer i between 0 and M-1.
  • Insert. Put at table index i if free; if not try i+1, i+2, etc.
  • Search. Search table index i; if occupied but no match, try i+1, i+2, etc.
  • Note. Array size M must be greater than number of key-value pairs N.
